name: Navigation Bar reduce height smaller Back button
description: Reduce size of Back button and reduce height of Navigation Bar. Firefox 34, Dec 2014, recreated grotesque enlarged back button, this style attempts to reduce size of Back button to match Forward button.
additional_info:
==== TOP OF NOTES -- SCROLLING AREA - LIMITED VIEW ===== There is always so much wasted space on the Firefox toolbars, and can't keep up with trying to reduce damages as Mozilla continually makes changes up and down on empty space but never removes bloated space on toolbars. Suggested companion to reduce wasted space on Bookmarks toolbar is Style 101569 (101569), which removes all bookmark icons on the toolbar and identifies folders with blue text, and bookmarks used as buttons with Red text. Bookmark icons elsewhere are not affected such as those within folders on the bookmarks toolbar, they are still shown.   (You must scroll down with inner ScrollBar to read all notes Below) Check other styles of mine, User 12592, along with their descriptions. For now skip my other Location/Navigation bar styles, keeping them up to date is a lost battle with no survivors. Would love to modify this so that the url can be read by someone in back of room from a projected screen, as you can see there is certainly room for a larger font, and with a larger font the Navigation toolbar would still be bloated with both empty vertical and horizontal space.
